snippet: Black leaders want the state’s attorney general to take over the investigation into the death of a man who was shocked repeatedly by police officers with stun guns.
abstract: Black leaders in Virginia call upon state's Atty Gen Mark Herring to take over investigation into death of black man Linwood R Lambert Jr, who was shocked repeatedly by police with stun guns; say review of death, which has taken two years, has been proceeding too slowly.
lead_paragraph: Black leaders want the state’s attorney general to take over the investigation into the death of a man who was shocked repeatedly by police officers with stun guns.

headline.main: Virginia: State Inquiry Sought Into Police Use of Stun Guns
headline.print_headline: Virginia: State Inquiry Sought Into Police Use of Stun Guns

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
